"Afei enuanom: "mma hom mma wonndua sunsum anaa asɛm
ɔfa hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest ne mbae n: anaa nwoma bi a ɔwɔ dɛ ofi hɛn hɔ do nndan hom adwen ntsɛm
na dɛ yɛbɔboa ano ehyia ne nkyɛn dze: anaa nntu hom akoma dɛ gyama Kraest da no enya edu."

"Afei enuanom: "Mma obiara nndaadaa hom wɔ biribiara ho
na dɛ yɛbɔboa ano ehyia ne nkyɛn dze: gyedɛ gyedzi ho asehwe no aba ana

ɔfa hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest ne mbae n: ɔmema noho do tsia dza wɔfrɛ no onyame biara
yɛkotow serɛ hom dɛ: ma ɔtsena Nyankopɔn asɔrdan mu dze noho kyerɛ dɛ ɔno nye Nyankopɔn no."

"Afei enuanom: "Ana hom nkaa dɛ mowɔ hom nkyɛn no mekaa yinom nyina kyerɛɛ hom?"
"Na afei hom nyim dza osiw kwan
ɔfa hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest ne mbae n: ama woeeyi no akyerɛ wɔ nankasa n'aber do."

"Afei enuanom: "Na mbrato esumasɛm no enya reyɛ edwuma
ɔfa hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest ne mbae n: na obi na orisiw kwan ma ekodu dɛ wobeyi no hɔ."

"Afei enuanom: "Nna nkyii wobeyi nyia onndzi mbra biara do no akyerɛ
ɔfa hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest ne mbae n: ɔno na Ewuradze Jesus dze n'anomu ehubɔw boku no
na dɛ yɛbɔboa ano ehyia ne nkyɛn dze: na ɔdze ne mbae no mpuei bɛma ɔaasɛɛ."

"Afei enuanom: "Ɔno ne mbae no ɔnam abɔnsam edwuma do ba
ɔfa hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest ne mbae n: wɔ tum nye nsɛnkyerɛdze nye ator anwanwadze nyina mu

"Afei enuanom: "nye dza ɔnntsen ndaadaa nyina mu ma hɔn a wɔreyew no
ɔfa hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest ne mbae n: osiandɛ wɔapow dɛ wɔbɔdɔ nokwar ma wɔaagye hɔn nkwa."

"Afei enuanom: "Iyi ntsi na Nyankopɔn soma ndaadaa dwumadzi ba hɔn mu ama wɔaagye atorsɛm edzi:"
"na woeebu hɔn a wɔanngye nokwar no enndzi na mbom hɔn enyi sɔɔ dza ɔnntsen no nyina atsɛn."

ɔfa hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest ne mbae n: ɔsɛ hɛn dɛ yɛda Nyankopɔn ase daa wɔ hom ntsi
yɛkotow serɛ hom dɛ: osiandɛ Nyankopɔn fi ahyɛse yii hom kɔr nkwagye mu wɔ Sunsum ahosan nye nokwar gyedzi a"

"Afei enuanom: "ɔnam hɛn asɛmpa no do afrɛ hom aba mu
ɔfa hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest ne mbae n: ma hom eenya Kraest Jesus enyimnyam no."

na dɛ yɛbɔboa ano ehyia ne nkyɛn dze: hom ngyina pintsinn na hom nsuo atsetsesɛm a yɛnam asɛm anaa nwoma do kyerɛkyerɛɛ hom no mu."

"Afei enuanom: "Afei hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest nankasa nye Egya Nyankopɔn a ɔdɔɔ hɛn na ɔmaa hɛn onnyiewiei awerɛkyekyer nye enyidado pa a ɔnam adom do no
na dɛ yɛbɔboa ano ehyia ne nkyɛn dze: "ɔnka hom akoma nto mu na ontsintsim hom wɔ asɛm nye edwuma pa nyina mu."
